newsitem.title: USA: Cinergy to let users choose gas supplier.
newsitem.headline: Cinergy to let users choose gas supplier.

text.p: Cinergy Corp said Monday that its subsidiary The Cincinnati Gas & Electric Co will file a plan with the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio to allow customers to choose their natural gas supplier.
The company said first phase of the choice program for residential and commercial customers in the state will begin in the fall.
It said it would consider expanding the program after it has enlisted 15,000 customers.
Cincergy's move goes in tandem with the deregulation of the industry in the United States.
